metadata.name: Virtual Hub Routing Intent
metadata.description: This module configures Routing Intent for a Virtual Hub; this module requires an existing Virtual Hub, as well the firewall Resource ID.
Required. Name of the Virtual Hub.
Required. Configures Routing Intent to forward Private traffic to the firewall (RFC1918).
Required. Configures Routing Intent to Forward Internet traffic to the firewall (0.0.0.0/0).

properties.routingPolicies: [if(and(equals(parameters('internetToFirewall'), true()), equals(parameters('privateToFirewall'), true())), createArray(createObject('name', '_policy_PublicTraffic', 'destinations', createArray('Internet'), 'nextHop', parameters('azureFirewallResourceId')), createObject('name', '_policy_PrivateTraffic', 'destinations', createArray('PrivateTraffic'), 'nextHop', parameters('azureFirewallResourceId'))), if(and(equals(parameters('internetToFirewall'), true()), equals(parameters('privateToFirewall'), false())), createArray(createObject('name', '_policy_PublicTraffic', 'destinations', createArray('Internet'), 'nextHop', parameters('azureFirewallResourceId'))), if(and(equals(parameters('internetToFirewall'), false()), equals(parameters('privateToFirewall'), true())), createArray(createObject('name', '_policy_PrivateTraffic', 'destinations', createArray('PrivateTraffic'), 'nextHop', parameters('azureFirewallResourceId'))), null())))]

metadata.description: The name of the Routing Intent configuration.
The resource ID of the Routing Intent configuration.
The resource group the Routing Intent configuration was deployed into.
